Kang Hyun-Jo is a rookie ranger at Jiri Mountain National Park. He graduated from the military academy and was once an army captain. He has a secret that he can't tell anyone about. These two people become partners and they work to save people around Jiri Mountain National Park.

Follow their journey in in their quest to uncover stories and knowledge about the food we love and cooking up a storm to be critiqued by the professionals and personalities of the week for their verdict on the dish.

programme.title: Kembara Kasih S5 - EP 1
programme.desc: Kembara Kasih kicks off Season 5 with Dalina Jaapar, passing the baton to her first celebrity host, Fadli Kamsani. Together with his volunteer, Zulayqha Zulkifli, they travel to Quezon city, Philippines, to visit a group of homeless people. Unique to them, home means living under a bridge, by the canal. Discover how vulnerable their day-to-day living is, through Fadli and Zulayqha as they navigate through their world under the bridge.

programme.title: Jalan Jalan Season 2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Join our documentary series as we traverse Indonesian cities, uncovering new and exciting places brimming with culture and fun. Embark on an adventure to experience the vibrant heart of Indonesia like never before. Each episode is a captivating journey that immerses you in the local way of life, providing a deeper connection to this enchanting archipelago.

programme.title: Food Adventure - EP 7
programme.desc: Embark on an epic cilinary adventure across the diverse cities of Indonesia in this captivating documentary series. Join our intrepid hosts as they traverse the archipelago in search of delectable and culturally rish dishes. From bustling street food stalls to hidden gems, each episode unveils the flavors, stories and traditions that make Indonesia cuisine a tantalizing journey worth savoring.

programme.title: Siapa Jaga Mak S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Amin and Hajah, together with their mother, move into their new home. Amin struggles with cargiving as Arif's rarely available to help due to his busy schedule. Hajah requests a week-long cruise before giving birth. Tijah met with her estranged children. Patrick initially refuses chemotherapy but family gives him full support and he undergoes treatment but suffers side effects

programme.title: Siapa Jaga Mak S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Saloma chokes while eating fishball alone at home, sparking arguments between her sons about their responsibilities towards their mother. Saloma is concerned about Hajah's pregnancy but faces resistance when offering advice. This causes friction between Amin and his wife Hajah. Patrick tries to move back to his own house while Harith tries to help Nurin who he thinks is facing caregiver burnout. Ismail's decision to work temporarily at a coffee shop creates conflict with his son Iskandar.

programme.title: To My Beloved (OTO)
programme.desc: Fernando is a good man who takes care of his only child, Daniel. Following the death of his wife Ana, every night Fernando recalls their love as he sorts out his beloved dead spouse’s belongings. One day he finds a VHS tape that will change everything.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: The Last Resort
programme.desc: Haunted by a colleague's suicide and grappling with guilt, Helen Dorn confronts the unspoken accusations of her fellow officers. At the same time, she is assigned to solve a medical student's murder, where she soon uncovers their double life.

programme.title: Love At First Fight
programme.desc: Between his friends and the family business, Arnaud's summer looks set to be a peaceful one. Peaceful until he runs into Madeleine, as beautiful as she is brusque, a concrete block of tensed muscles and doomsday prophecies.

programme.title: Thank You For Coming
programme.desc: After coming to the realization that time is not on his side, a small-time actor who currently works as a restaurant waiter, must try anything and everything to fulfil his dream of starring in a feature film.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Most Beautiful Day
programme.desc: As the tide off Sylt starts to recede, a car emerges with a dead man behind the wheel. The driver, Stefan, did not drown. He was poisoned. Stefan was a wedding videographer, but he also had a very lucrative side business – blackmailing brides and grooms.

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: Twenty years after the Romanian Revolution, Tavi finds out from his secret police file that he might have a son he had not known about. In his search for the truth, Tavi gets caught up in his complicated past which threatens to mess up his current life.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: The Red Cloth
programme.desc: A fatal arson incident draws Helen Dorn into a far-left extremist community, who has targeted wealthy real estate agent Ralph Wagner. While they deny any involvement in the crime, it is indeed suspicious that they were previously almost ousted by Wagner.

programme.title: Not Here To Be Loved
programme.desc: Jean-Claude is a disillusioned middle-age man who has long forgotten to smile. He is divorced, has a strained relationship with his only son and thinks his father never loved him. Then, he steps in to a tango school and meets Francoise and life changes.

programme.title: Backwards
programme.desc: Inspired by true events. The story of a young mother of an autistic boy, whose many years of stubbornness and the fight against bureaucracy and human heartlessness led to changes in the education system.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.

programme.title: Murder in Charente
programme.desc: When 38-year-old Cyril is found murdered on the grounds of a grand estate, pregnant detective Maud Arthuis teams up with private investigator Lucien Labeguerri. As secrets unravel and another murder occurs, the case becomes deeply personal for them both.

programme.title: Catch The Wind
programme.desc: Edith is a middle-aged woman, estranged from her son and now about to lose her job as a textile factory worker. With nothing to hold her to her hometown, she decides to move to Morocco where her factory has relocated instead of facing unemployment.

programme.title: Take It Or Leave it
programme.desc: 30-year-old construction worker Erik suddenly finds himself a single parent when his ex-girlfriend, whom he hasn’t seen for six months, has a baby girl and informs him that she’ll put the child up for adoption unless he wants to take care of his daughter.

programme.title: Forgive Me. Thank You.
programme.desc: A computer science fresh graduate finds himself unable to secure a job due to his deafness. The discrimination he faces forces him to confront his anxieties and take control of his own destiny.

While overseeing renovations to her beach house in 1970s Chile, Carmen’s quiet life is upended when a priest asks her to hide a wounded fugitive. As she steps beyond her quiet life, Carmen is pulled into the undercurrents of a politically tumultuous Chile.

programme.title: Mammal (OTO)
programme.desc: Margaret (Rachel Griffiths), a silently grieving divorcee forms an intense bond with Joe (Barry Keoghan), a homeless youth. Their oedipal relationship is threatened by the wrath of Margaret’s ex-husband and Joe’s involvement with a gang of violent youths.

programme.title: LEGO Masters USA S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: This returning series brings imagination, design and creativity to life when teams of LEGO enthusiasts go head-to-head, with infinite possibilities and anunlimited supply of LEGO bricks. Teams of two will compete against each other in ambitious brick-building challenges to be crowned the country's most talented amateur LEGO builders.

programme.title: You Might Get Lost
programme.desc: After the tragic death of her son, Arlene loses everything, her husband, her home and she starts to lose her mind. When the mysterious Endeavour Institute offers her a chance to travel back and change things, she eagerly accepts and begins her journey to the past. Plagued by the memories of her alternate reality, Arlene must separate the real from the false without upsetting the delicate balance . She is unprepared for the terrible price she must pay for saving her son.

programme.title: Modern Marvels: Food - EP 4
programme.desc: Modern Marvels goes straight for the taste buds in an all-compassing celebration and exploration of food. Celebrated food expert Adam Richman crisscrosses the country taking a deep dive into how food products are made, detailing both the process of the craft and the inspiration behind the ideas.

programme.desc: 18 new castaways battle it out on the islands of Fiji for a million dollars and the title of Sole Survivor.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: The Red Cloth
programme.desc: A fatal arson incident draws Helen Dorn into a far-left extremist community, who has targeted wealthy real estate agent Ralph Wagner. While they deny any involvement in the crime, it is indeed suspicious that they were previously almost ousted by Wagner.

programme.title: Not Here To Be Loved
programme.desc: Jean-Claude is a disillusioned middle-age man who has long forgotten to smile. He is divorced, has a strained relationship with his only son and thinks his father never loved him. Then, he steps in to a tango school and meets Francoise and life changes.

programme.title: Backwards
programme.desc: Inspired by true events. The story of a young mother of an autistic boy, whose many years of stubbornness and the fight against bureaucracy and human heartlessness led to changes in the education system.

programme.title: Murder in Charente
programme.desc: When 38-year-old Cyril is found murdered on the grounds of a grand estate, pregnant detective Maud Arthuis teams up with private investigator Lucien Labeguerri. As secrets unravel and another murder occurs, the case becomes deeply personal for them both.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: The Right To Remain Silent
programme.desc: During a hunting trip, Rolf Kanther, director of a military tech manufacturer, is shot right next to his daughter. Inspector Helen Dorn is sent to investigate the suspicious death, and needs to find out if it's an accident or a calculated murder.

programme.title: Catch The Wind
programme.desc: Edith is a middle-aged woman, estranged from her son and now about to lose her job as a textile factory worker. With nothing to hold her to her hometown, she decides to move to Morocco where her factory has relocated instead of facing unemployment.

programme.title: Puan
programme.desc: When Professor Marcelo Pena finally is about to be appointed Head of the Philosophy Department, the famous and seductive Professor Sujarchuk returns from Europe to claim the kingdom for himself.

programme.title: Forgive Me. Thank You.
programme.desc: A computer science fresh graduate finds himself unable to secure a job due to his deafness. The discrimination he faces forces him to confront his anxieties and take control of his own destiny.

programme.title: Take It Or Leave it
programme.desc: 30-year-old construction worker Erik suddenly finds himself a single parent when his ex-girlfriend, whom he hasn’t seen for six months, has a baby girl and informs him that she’ll put the child up for adoption unless he wants to take care of his daughter.

programme.title: Premiere Affaire
programme.desc: Nora, a young and an inexperienced criminal defense lawyer is charged with the case of a teenage boy accused of murdering a neighbour.

While overseeing renovations to her beach house in 1970s Chile, Carmen’s quiet life is upended when a priest asks her to hide a wounded fugitive. As she steps beyond her quiet life, Carmen is pulled into the undercurrents of a politically tumultuous Chile.

programme.title: The Salvation Of The World As We Know It
programme.desc: After a suicide attempt, 17-year-old Paul is sent to a psychiatric centre by his father. There, he encounters other youths with issues just like him, one of whom is Toni.

programme.title: Amerika Square
programme.desc: In modern-day Athens, a racist local disrupts the escape plans of a Syrian doctor and an African Singer who both want to smuggle out of Greece. As time runs out, tattoo artist Billy steps in to organize their desperate escape.

programme.title: Deserted
programme.desc: While on assignment to the Sinai coast, Swedish photojournalist Ingrid is kidnapped by a group of Palestinian men and hidden in the desert. An unlikely love affair arises between Ingrid and one of her captors, Ali.
